MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G34 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.10pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at the Auchinlea Road substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:16am on 19th November 2020.
